text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Oh, #BunkerBoy!
You didn't create shit.
You were riding Obama's coattails and now you've got nothing.
No plan.
No idea how to fix coronavirus, protestors, the economy.
It'll just be more whining and blaming from BunkerBoy.
Nice fence around the fenced in White House.
Idiot.
